Calculate cycling uptake using PCT Go Dutch scenario

routes_pct_uptake.Rd

Estimates cycling potential based on route distance and hilliness using the Propensity to Cycle Tool (PCT) Go Dutch model for school trips.

Usage

routes_pct_uptake(
  routes,
  trips.col = names(routes)[grep("trip", names(routes))],
  length.col = "length",
  max.length = 30000,
  hilliness.col = "route_hilliness"
)

Arguments

routes

An sf object with route data

trips.col

Column name for trip counts. Auto-detected by default.

length.col

Column name for route length. Default: "length"

max.length

Maximum route length for uptake calculation. Default: 30000m

hilliness.col

Column name for route hilliness. Default: "route_hilliness"

Value

An sf object with added columns: pcycle_godutch (proportion) and bicycle_godutch (absolute numbers)

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
routes_with_uptake <- routes_pct_uptake(routes_almada)
} # }
